data.name: Fantasy Grounds - 5E Mini-Dungeon #021: Daenyr’s Return (5E)
data.detailed_description:
A 5E Mini-Dungeon 4-6 Characters of Levels 8-9


3,500 years have passed since the vampire Daenyr and his followers terrorized the countryside from his dark temple. His name now myth, his temple in ruins save for a few remaining chambers; no one recalls how or why this came to be. A mysterious cult has taken up residence in the ruins, and rumors of blood rituals and a crimson god are spreading across the countryside, while many disappearances go unanswered.

5E Mini-Dungeons are small adventures for 5th Edition which are setting agnostic and are easily inserted anywhere in your campaign.

Released on December 23, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.1 and higher.

Requires: A Fantasy Grounds full or ultimate license or an active subscription and the included 5E Ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
